name: Amara (starcerealgames, honeybeebs, jolteons, jimmy_twohands, dcynex)
description:
amara

play as amara, an elven space commander investigating the halt of their expansion, only to find herself fighting back against the resource-full planet that has already consumed her crew

controls
  • move - wasd / arrow
  • melee - f / x / j
  • fireball - c / k
  • jump/glide - space / hold
  • activate checkpoint - up arrow key

*note: the game runs much smoother with hardware acceleration on in your browser; feel free to switch it on (or maybe open in edge) for a smoother experience

info

made for the Metroidvania Month 19 Game Jam by star cereal games

credits
